heading: CMS
paragraph: Tried, tested, and reviewed by the community

productCards.title: Preact — Fast 3kB alternative to React with the same modern API
productCards.description: Thinnest possible Virtual DOM abstraction on top of the DOM. It builds on stable platform features, registers real event handlers and plays nicely with other libraries.

productCards.title: WordPress — WordPress is open source software you can use to create a beautiful website, blog, or app.
productCards.description: Trusted by the Best. 43% of the web uses WordPress, from hobby blogs to the biggest news sites online.

productCards.title: Strapi — Design APIs fast, manage content easily.
productCards.description: Strapi is the next-gen headless CMS, open-source, javascript, enabling content-rich experiences to be created, managed and exposed to any digital device.

productCards.title: Contentful — Launch faster with a modern content platform
productCards.description: More than a headless CMS, Contentful is the API-first content management platform to create, manage and publish content on any digital channel.

productCards.title: Google Sites — A totally rebuilt Sites, customer-tested and open for business
productCards.description: Google Sites is a structured wiki- and Web page-creation tool offered by Google. The declared goal of Google Sites is for anyone to be able to create simple web sites that support collaboration between different editors.

productCards.title: WordPress Playground — Experience a WordPress that runs entirely in your browser!
productCards.description: Explore, experiment, and play with WordPress—no setup required! WordPress Playground is a flexible tool that lets you: Try plugins and themes in a live virtual environment Experiment with an anonymous WordPress website

productCards.title: Ghost — Publish online, build a business, work from home
productCards.description: The world's most popular modern open source publishing platform. A headless Node.js CMS used by Apple, Sky News, Tinder and thousands more. MIT licensed, with 30k+ stars on Github.

productCards.title: Notaku — Docs websites powered by Notion
productCards.description: Notaku creates awesome docs websites from your Notion pages It's like GitBook but using Notion for your CMS Notaku is not limited to docs websites, you can also build docs, blog, help desk, changelog and roadmap websites.

productCards.title: Docusaurus — Easy to maintain open source documentation websites
productCards.description: Docusaurus helps you ship a top-notch documentation site in no time! Focus on your content: just write Markdown files! Put your site online in 5 minutes, then customize it. Full-featured: plugins, themes, search, blog, versioning, i18n, React...

productCards.title: Zoho — An integrated suite of business apps
productCards.description: Unique and powerful suite of software to run your entire business, brought to you by a company with the long term vision to transform the way you work.
